title: Zoning change for Morning Star Church

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 166      INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN FREEMAN BOSLEY, SR. An Ordinance recommended by the Planning Commission on September 2, 2015, to change the zoning of property as indicated on the District Map and in City Block 972, from "C" Multiple-Family Dwelling District to the "G" Local Commercial and Office District, at 2615, 2617 & 2619 James 'Cool Papa' Bell Avenue and from "C" Multiple-Family Dwelling District and "G" Local Commercial and Office District to the "G" Local Commercial and Office District only, at 1301-13 N. Jefferson, so as to include the described parcels of land in City Block 972; and containing an emergency clause.
